scripts.typecheck: cd ../.. && ${TSONIC_BIN:-tsonic} restore --project server && cd packages/server && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build: cd ../.. && ${TSONIC_BIN:-tsonic} restore --project server && ${TSONIC_BIN:-tsonic} generate --project server && bash ./scripts/generate-ef-compiled-model.sh && ${TSONIC_BIN:-tsonic} build --no-generate --project server
scripts.dev: cd ../.. && ${TSONIC_BIN:-tsonic} restore --project server && ${TSONIC_BIN:-tsonic} generate --project server && bash ./scripts/generate-ef-compiled-model.sh && ${TSONIC_BIN:-tsonic} run --no-generate --project server
